Docs.summary: 包含支持 Windows 窗体和 WPF 控件的互操作的类。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 命名空间包含实现[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]技术之间的互操作的类。 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration> 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration>类时，可以在页面上[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]承载控件，并[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]在基于的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]应用程序中承载元素。
实现互操作功能的两个关键类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>和。 使用哪个类取决于您的控件实现：
- 当必须<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>使用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]页面上的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]控件时，请使用类。
- 当必须<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>在基于的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]应用程序中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]使用元素时，请使用类。
